catalyst: The photocatalyst used in the experiment was 50 mg of a substance added into the quartz reactor and dispersed in 140 mL H2O. Based on the context, the photocatalyst is La2Sn2O7 with Au loading.
reaction medium: The photocatalytic reactions were carried out with 50 mg photocatalyst dispersed in 140 mL H2O, indicating a liquid reaction medium.
